website_summaries.verdict: A very basic tote bag with a clear design so you can see everything inside.
pros: The tote bag features durable straps and a clear design that makes it easy to spot what's inside
The bottom of the bag is well-protected and a zipper at the top ensures your beach supplies stay safe and secure
The clear vinyl material is also waterproof
cons: No extra pockets for storing small items

customer_reviews.title: Great tote bag!
customer_reviews.text: This product was exactly as described. I got two of these bags for my granddaughters for use when they visit for the weekend. The bags are large enough to keep their crafts and activities organized. The clear plastic material is thick and sturdy, and allows us to easily identify what is inside. The straps and zipper are strong enough to stand up to frequent use. The bottom line - these tote bags are well constructed. I would recommend this product and would definitely order again.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Large Clear Tote Bag with Zipper Closure
customer_reviews.text: I am a nurse and was looking for something large enough to carry my nursing gear. I wanted it to be clear so I could find what I needed at a glance. This tote holds all my gear plus some. I can find what I need quickly. I love this tote. Thinking about getting another!
customer_reviews.author: Red

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy this product.
customer_reviews.text: Very poor quality. Looks like it’s from the dollar store. Not worth what I paid for it. Would never use it for fear it would break. Supposed to have a logo doesn’t . Would never buy again
customer_reviews.author: R. Rosenberg

customer_reviews.title: Clear zipper totes
customer_reviews.text: There great. I now have 12 of these totes. One for each work in progress. Crochet, quilting, and needle work. I take them every where. You can see at a glance what project I wish to work on next.
customer_reviews.author: PD-cats

customer_reviews.title: The idea of this bag is wonderful, the transparent plastic part is very thick that ...
customer_reviews.text: The idea of this bag is wonderful, the transparent plastic part is very thick that would survive even poking with knitting needles. However I received a bag that was cut through on the bottom, looked like someone ran a paper cutter through the fabric. (Needless to say I got it from warehouse deals, lesson learned). I would have loved this bag if it was not destroyed on arrival.
customer_reviews.author: R F

customer_reviews.title: Great high visibility bag
customer_reviews.text: These are very sturdy - and have heavy duty bottom, zipper, and handles. Can hold quite a lot of weight. As our world deals with more and more safety risks and does not want backpacks and opaque bags carried into crowded situations, this allows easy viewing and the handle is long enough for a shoulder bag or carrying down at your side.
customer_reviews.author: CSR in GBG

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy
customer_reviews.text: The clear tote bag appears to made quite sturdily and will meet my needs (carrying misc items for tailgating). I was hoping for a more vibrant red as shown in the picture, but it is muted - almost a dark rose shade. But, given the overall quality and price, it is very good.
customer_reviews.author: C. M.

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: These were great used them for gift bags during christmas.
customer_reviews.author: Madre

customer_reviews.title: Nice bag
customer_reviews.text: unlike most of the reviewers.. I don't work in a prison. I actually work in a spa but we are forced to wear clear bags (Because expensive products always seem to go missing). I've always had a hard time finding clear bags at target, kohls and I am not going to lie but I HATE walmart and refuse to look there. This bag is clear, cute and a perfect size! It holds my wallet, books, makeup, umbrella and water bottle with no problem. I've actually even gotten compliments on it and people at work have been asking me where I got my bag. GOOD BUY! If I ever need another one I will no doubt buy it from here =)
customer_reviews.author: joykkkkk

customer_reviews.title: It's a good bag when you need visibility!!
customer_reviews.text: The bag is perfect for what I need. I'm going to order another one. I teach children after school, and it's essential to be able to find materials as fast as I can. And the size of the bag is good for me. I can carry just enough stuff before it gets too heavy.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca A. Saunders

customer_reviews.title: This tote bag is awesome. I do beadding projects and always have to ...
customer_reviews.text: This tote bag is awesome. I do beading projects and always had to get all the boxes out to find the right beads. With this tote I can see right away which box I need (also see-through). Also, is very roomy. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Pointer

customer_reviews.title: Knitters take note of this great tote
customer_reviews.text: Great tote for knitting projects, no need to unzip to see which is which. Would make a great gift for other knitters, too. Haven't used it long enough to comment on its durability but will in the fullness of time.
customer_reviews.author: Dangerous when CookingTop Contributor: Knitting

customer_reviews.title: Great bad for preschool stuff
customer_reviews.text: Our preschool recently implemented a policy that any items you leave in their cubby like extra clothes need to be in a clear container so the teachers can ensure there isn't anything in them that could hurt the kids if they get into it - i.e. - sunscreen, bug spray. This bag is a great size to fit a few outfits and an extra jacket for my daughter. I also like the zipper so things don't fall out when our 3 yo insists on carrying it herself.
customer_reviews.author: Kirsten L. Neff

customer_reviews.title: It was very nice, but much smaller then I visioned. Much smaller. Make sure you look at the sizes on this item.
customer_reviews.text: It was very nice, but much smaller then I visioned. Much smaller. Make sure you look at the sizes on this item.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good bag for many uses
customer_reviews.text: Only problem I have found is that the zipper failed the second week. Did not have half full when it separated. My 2nd one is holding up very well. Handles are just right length to out over shoulder. Like the fact that the bottom is made of material which gives more strength to it & still passes for a clear bag which is required at work. Gave a 4 only due to issue with the zipper.
customer_reviews.author: juri

customer_reviews.title: I really like this tote bag
customer_reviews.text: I really like this tote bag. I use it for work it makes it easy to go through security and I can carry everything I need. I have purchased several for coworkers and they love them.
customer_reviews.author: Yolanda B

customer_reviews.title: Very durable lasted the full year
customer_reviews.text: Item has described. Second time ordering these for my children for school. Very durable lasted the full year.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: These bags are the best large totes their large , strong and well crafted,I have a couple of colors.

customer_reviews.title: ZIPPER!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I really am glad I have this bag (black). I ordered red for co-worker now three others have them in purple, blue too. We are required to have clear bags for work and this holds lunches, tablets, books, Kindles, Outside pockets perfect for keys and ID............love this bag. The ZIPPER is the best part.
customer_reviews.author: mighty j

customer_reviews.title: Cute bag, great color
customer_reviews.text: Cute bag. Works well for what I need it for. I will purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: Dara

customer_reviews.title: Good quality.
customer_reviews.text: I'm using it as an Easter basket gift for a grandson and in-turn he can use it as a beach bag for the summer. I've filled it with Beach items plus Easter items. So far with the weight in it, it is holding up. Good quality.
customer_reviews.author: C Jennings

customer_reviews.title: As advertised
customer_reviews.text: The bags are just as advertised. The material seems to be thick enough not to tear like other clear totes. We bought these as shower bags for camping trips. They hold a full-sized towel, toiletries, my daughter's blow-dryer & a change of clothes without issues.
customer_reviews.author: The Sheepherder

customer_reviews.title: I love it! It's sturdy enough to hold everything I ...
customer_reviews.text: I love it! It's sturdy enough to hold everything I need for beach day. Very nice for shopping days too.

customer_reviews.title: Very nice - bought for going to pool
customer_reviews.text: Very nice - bought for going to pool. They are plenty big for all necessities. Don't know how long they will last but appear to be very well made.

customer_reviews.title: I needed for my daughter school to put her sleeping ...
customer_reviews.text: I needed for my daughter school to put her sleeping bag

customer_reviews.title: Couldn't ask for better!! Sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Couldn't ask for better!! Sturdy, love the zipper, and very clear with no cloudiness, etc. I bought them for knitting. It's somewhat difficult to find bags that actually zip and are a decent size. I had no disappointments.
customer_reviews.author: Kelli A. Byers

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Durable and has really held up much better than I expected!!

customer_reviews.title: Great beach bag
customer_reviews.text: this is the perfect bag for the beach and if you dont mind people being able to see whats inside your bag then i guess you could use it every day too. spacious nice etc what more can you ask for- im very satisfied!
customer_reviews.author: Jess

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I like the quality and durability of this bag because of the straps and size; will order again..

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Had these for over 2 years and still going strong.

customer_reviews.title: its a really good tote bag

customer_reviews.title: I love the bag and the zipper is so nice also
customer_reviews.text: I love the bag and the zipper is so nice also! Used it once, and then plan to use it for vacation!

customer_reviews.title: As described
customer_reviews.text: This is a regular purchase for us. Usually lasts about six months before it starts to rip at the corners and where the handles are joined to the clear plastic. Not to expensive, so no big deal.

customer_reviews.title: nice clear bag

customer_reviews.author: Rin Y

customer_reviews.title: Great bag
customer_reviews.text: I use this to organize (and carry) my daughter's toys such as playmobil, little pony... It's great to see what is inside the bag, keeping everything organized! i have already bought 4 of these and I am very satisfied so far!

customer_reviews.title: Good size and it zips
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for vacation to beach. It is a good size. I can locate the bag due to bright color. It zips to keep everything inside. Very pleased with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: L.W.

customer_reviews.title: Great for Work!
customer_reviews.text: I have spent nearly 100's of dollars on fancy/cute bags for work, and I managed to destroy each and every one of them in rapid succession. I received one of these as a gift, and its life span of 6 months outlived any other previous bag I've owned. I now have ordered a few more as spares, and at only $10 is a great value. It is constructed of heavyweight clear plastic, with fabric handles and bottom. Very easy to clean, as well.
customer_reviews.author: ChelleChell

customer_reviews.title: the real tote bag
customer_reviews.text: my wife just love these large clear tote bags I bought her one of each color she uses them for her work thank you very much if you buy these you will be very satisfied they are very large

customer_reviews.title: needed for work

customer_reviews.title: Large Clear Tote in Red with Zipper Closure
customer_reviews.text: The zipper tote I ordered in red, arrived promptly and is just what I wanted. I will be using it to take my medical papers on my appointments - it's a great see-through tote. Thank you Amazon - I may be ordering another. .

customer_reviews.title: Clear tote bag.
customer_reviews.text: I am very pleased with my tote bag. I work at a prison and have to be shook down every time I enter the building. My clear bag saves time since they can see whats in it.

customer_reviews.title: Great For Shopping!!
customer_reviews.text: The best shopping bag for its durability, transparency, and, water-proof qualities! Will save you money in the long term if you have to pay for your bags at the check-out! A terrific beach bag, too!

customer_reviews.title: Great for football season!
customer_reviews.text: These bags are nice to carry into football games this fall where purses aren't allowed. I also ordered one for a friend

customer_reviews.title: Works great for me.

customer_reviews.title: Too Large
customer_reviews.text: It is too large for my purpose. I needed something to take my Bibles and other materials into the prison where I volunteer as a Chaplain and the bag was just to cumbersome. The officers checking me in had little or no regard for the contents as they replaced them back in the bag after going through them. I now have a plastic bucket with a handle and they are able to see and replace the item without making a mess of them. Thanks for your inquiry. I'm sorry it didn't work out.
customer_reviews.author: Chaplain Chris Allen

product_meta.title: Large Clear Tote Bag with Zipper Closure (Red)
product_meta.description:
This large and sturdy clear tote bag is available in Red, Black, and Royal Blue. Features a top zipper closure and large clear exterior pocket. Perfect for shopping, work, travel, or the beach.




PRODUCT DETAILS
 * Is Discontinued By Manufacturer :No
 * Product Dimensions :14.49 x 6.5 x 2.01 inches; 6.4 Ounces
 * Item model number :LG Clear Tote Bag w Zipper Closure Red
 * Department :Womens
 * Date First Available :November 9, 2010
 * ASIN :B004BG5JOQ

 * .zg_hrsr_item {list-style : none};

    *  #1620 inWomen's Shoulder Handbags 
    *  #1219 inWomen's Tote Handbags

Zippered top closure, clear interior pocket.
Clear vinyl body with sturdy colored bottom and handles.
Authentic Bellus branded clear nylon tote bag.

specifications.Item model number: LG Clear Tote Bag w Zipper Closure Red
